titleStmt.title: A copie of the Queens letter from the Hague in Holland to the Kings Maiesty residing at Yorke. Sent from the Hague by one of her Maiesties gentlemen ushers, March 19. 1641.
titleStmt.author: Henrietta Maria, Queen, consort of Charles I, King of England, 1609-1669.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
